    email: msg.user.email,
    phone_no: msg.user.phone_no,
    username: username,
    lang: msg.user.lang? msg.user.lang: "en",
    doc_type: "users"
}
return msg;

func:
let data = msg.payload

data['tenant'] = msg.req.params.tenant
data['line'] = msg.req.params.line
data['form'] = msg.req.params.form
// data['username'] = msg.protengaUser.username
data['start_submitted_date'] = new Date()
data['start_timestamp'] = msg.original.timestamp
data['start_id'] = msg.processId
data['incomplete'] = true
data['selectProcess'] = msg.original.selectProcess

let originalData = msg.original;
delete originalData.timestamp
delete originalData.selectProcess
delete originalData.action
delete originalData.productionLine
delete originalData.workstationForm
delete originalData.dataRecord

let metadata = flow.get("$parent.metadata");
msg.payload = {...data,...originalData, ...metadata}
msg.original = msg.payload
return msg;

structure

structure
func:
// Provision the device and create proper device name

let originalDeviceLocation = msg.original.sensorDeviceLocation

let deviceConfig = msg.payload[0].value
let deviceLocation = msg.original.sensorDeviceLocation
let deviceClassInitial = msg.original.sensorDeviceClassInitial
let deviceNameSuffix = msg.original.sensorDeviceNameSuffix
let deviceAlias = msg.original.sensorDeviceAlias
let deviceName

// Cannot have dash (-) in naming
deviceLocation = replacer(deviceLocation, '-', '_')
deviceClassInitial = replacer(deviceClassInitial, '-', '_')
deviceNameSuffix = replacer(deviceNameSuffix, '-', '_')

// Name it as <location>-<device_class>-<suffix>
deviceName = deviceLocation + '-'
deviceName = deviceName + deviceClassInitial + '-'
deviceName = deviceName + deviceNameSuffix

deviceConfig['deviceName'] = deviceName
deviceConfig['location'] = originalDeviceLocation
deviceConfig['provisioned'] = true
deviceConfig['deviceAlias'] = deviceAlias

msg.deviceConfig = deviceConfig
msg.payload = deviceConfig
return msg;

function replacer(data, a, b) {
    return data.split('-').join('_')
}

func:
let groupLine = 'breeding'
let groupForm = 'pupation-setup-detail'
let rows = msg.payload.masterData
let grouped = []

// node.warn(rows)

for (let row of rows) {
    let line = row.productionLine
    let form = row.workstationForm
    
    if (line !== groupLine) continue
    if (form !== groupForm) continue
    
    grouped.push(row)
}

msg.payload = grouped
return msg;

name: group
func:
let groupLine = 'breeding'
let groupForm = 'grow-out-setup'
let rows = msg.payload.masterData
let grouped = []

// node.warn(rows)

for (let row of rows) {
    let line = row.productionLine
    let form = row.workstationForm
    
    if (line !== groupLine) continue
    if (form !== groupForm) continue
    
    grouped.push(row)
}

msg.payload = grouped
return msg;

name: query
func:
let selector = msg.payload.query.selector
let sort = msg.payload.query.sort
let limit = msg.config.limit
let bookmark = ''
let use_index = '_design/ts-ID-index'
let fields = msg.fields
let update = false
let conflicts = false
let query = {
    selector,
    sort,
    limit,
    bookmark,
    use_index,
    fields,
    update,
    conflicts,
    execution_stats: true
}

msg.query = query
msg.topic = 'environmentdata'
msg.payload = query
return msg;

name: config
func:
let limit = 300
let cacheKey = 'knownDeviceDataFields'
let requestedFileName = msg.req.body.filename
let user = '_' + msg.token.username

let fileDirectory = 'export-csv-sensor-data/'
let fileName = requestedFileName + user
let fileExtension = '.csv'
let filePath = fileDirectory + fileName + fileExtension

let config = {
    limit,
    cacheKey: 'knownDeviceDataFields',
    fileDirectory,
    fileName,
    fileExtension,
    filePath
}

msg.config = config
return msg;

cache
logs
SeperateSection
sort
func:
// markers is a sort sequence

let markers = [
    'dried-larvae',
    'frass',
    'barchart-existing',
    'prepupae-setup',
    'no-of-breeding-rack-setup',
    'no-of-rack-breeding-harvested',
    'total-feed-used',
    'dried-larvae-weight',
    'frass-weight',
    'fresh-larvae-weight',
    'no-of-racks-setup',
    'baby-larvae-for-farming',
    'no-of-farming-rack-setup',
    'no-of-farming-racks-harvested',
    'total-feed-used-farming'
]
let payload = msg.payload
let sorted = []

for (let marker of markers) {
    for (let p of payload) {
        if (p.marker === marker) sorted.push(p)
    }
}

msg.payload = sorted
return msg;
